title: Dynamic Orbs System
description: Dynamic Orbs System, makes visual send and receive any values with particles or actors, optimized and can fit any project genre.
longDescription:
[Quick]

  • 1. Example Video/Tutorial Playlist: Youtube Link!
  • 2. Playable Demo: Download Link!


(UPD - 2022)

I am happy to announce all my Unreal Engine content is free now!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

Latest info about content in the video ~ Youtube Link!

Please watch the video, it explains my current situation and info about support.

Also use the discord channel for any questions or support now ~ Discord Link!


[About]

This is specific system to visually send and receive values between actors.

Send and receive any values visually by orbs system, like sending stats from one actor to another by visual particles.


This can be used in any project genre, RPG or Action, strategy and etc, to visually receive various values by defeating enemies or by any other way. Example like receiving health points, upgrade points, various buffs and etc. Also can be used for unique visual effects.


[Details]

As a single component, is easy to attach to any existing actor without specific setups and changes, it is very modular.

System does have multiple features on how to send the orbs, by various percentage values or by direct values, the amount and scale can be specified easily, unique optimization logic to keep performance high by queueing the orbs flow smoothly.


[Misc]

Orbs particle can be changed to any custom one, project does include example particles.

The code is clean and commented, it is easy for any custom modifications.


[Note]

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.


[Extra]

Link to our my Youtube page - https://www.youtube.com/c/MasterDinochan

Link to our my Unreal page - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Master+Dinochan

Subscribe and follow me to support more free content!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!
technicalDetails:
Features:
  • 1. Finite orbs system for any project.
  • 2. Can be used in any project genre.
  • 3. As a single component, uniquely modular and easy to use.
  • 4. Customizable features and settings.
  • 5. Examples of usage for quick start.
  • 6. Does include all effects and assets from video.
  • 7. Effective optimization, clean commented code.


Disk Size: 10.2 MB

Blueprints: 1 component, 1 actor, 4 particles.

Input: Gamepad/Keyboard/Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: PC, Consoles, Mobile. (Tested only on Windows)

Supported Target Build Platforms: All. (Tested only on Windows)


Note:

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: V2 Update with new features - Orbs that can be pulled by input/radius.
